game.name: WISE GUYS
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wise Guys is a ruthless, high-stakes social deduction game where trust is a weapon and betrayal is just survival. Up to 8 players race against time to clean up their criminal operation and get out before the raid hits. Meanwhile, a Rat is quietly sabotaging the crew at every turn.
